definition: fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86

sentences.english: Care must be taken to completely seal entrance plugs(eg. at a manway)in refractory linings.
sentences.chinese: 必須小心地完全封閉耐火材料襯裏的進口門。

sentences.english: The development of bio-soluble refractory fibres was reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 總結了可溶性耐火纖維生物性能的測試方法。

sentences.english: Fire-resistant experiments on two full scale steel columns are first presented.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了兩個足尺鋼柱的耐火試驗。

sentences.english: Their factory specializes in producing fire-proof materials.
sentences.chinese: 他們廠是一家專門生產耐火材料的工廠。

sentences.english: The oven was made of a roughly built cube of fire-bricks.
sentences.chinese: 烤箱是用做工粗糙的近似立方形的耐火磚做的。

sentences.english: The heat loss can be considerably reduced by the use of firebricks round the walls of the boiler.
sentences.chinese: 通過在爐壁周圍使用耐火磚，熱損失可以被大大降低。

sentences.english: The focal discussion point has been put on the preparation and application of zirconium oxide refractory fibre.
sentences.chinese: 重點討論了氧化鋯耐火纖維的製備與應用。

sentences.english: It is suitable to make refractory containing carbon.
sentences.chinese: 由此合成的結合劑適用於含碳耐火材料的製造。

sentences.english: Sillimanite refractory castable is good in use at combustion zone in CFB boilers.
sentences.chinese: 硅線石耐火澆注料適用於流化牀鍋爐的燃燒部位。

sentences.english: Solvents and chemicals industries, plastics industry, ceramics and refractory materials.
sentences.chinese: 溶劑及化學工業，塑膠業，陶瓷及耐火材等。

sentences.english: Alkalies also cause severe wear of common refractories.
sentences.chinese: 鹼還嚴重地浸蝕通用的耐火材料。

sentences.english: Sillimanite is widely used as an important material for high-grade refractory products.
sentences.chinese: 硅線石用途廣泛，也是高級耐火材料的重要原料。

sentences.english: It is used for refractory material and steel industry according to different property.
sentences.chinese: 根據不同的性能，可用於耐火材料和鍊鋼造渣劑用等。

sentences.english: So it can be used to predict thermal properties of refractory fibers.
sentences.chinese: 爲預測耐火纖維材料的熱物性探索了一條新方法。

sentences.english: The technology of instant concret steam boiler shelling is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了蒸汽鍋爐耐火混凝土爐牆現澆成型施工工藝。

sentences.english: If you use firebricks round the walls of the boiler, the heat loss.
sentences.chinese: 爐壁採用耐火磚可大大降低熱耗。

definition: phenolic aldehyde/phenolic resin (used to manufacture bakelite)
to sinter/to agglomerate ore by burning
acetal resin/Delrin/unplasticized polyvinyl chloride (uPVC or rigid PVC)
